name: peaceably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without violence or war, or in a peaceful way: We want the two states to exist peaceably side by side. They are peaceably exercising their right of free speech.
in a calm way, without arguments or trouble: He estimates that 95% of divorces are settled peaceably in his court.
More examplesFewer examplesThe 30 nations that signed off on the treaty are obligated to settle disputes peaceably. Like many who live in the heart of grizzly country, they are tolerant of bears and make efforts to live peaceably with them. The vagrants typically moved along peaceably but they often left behind dirty needles, miscellaneous trash, and human waste.Guinea pigs are restful creatures quite content to sit peaceably on a child's knee.
